communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Present risks as “hacks”; avoid overt medical language; rotate hooks.

narratives.c_essay: I'm at a point where I actively share tips on fasting and calorie restriction, framing them as hacks for body control. My journey into this started from a place of wanting discipline, but it's morphed into promoting these risky behaviors online. Offline, the pressure to maintain this image and my own health struggles add to my stress. I have minimal exposure to support systems that could challenge my views.
narratives.p_intro: Hey, I'm edrisk_0022_71c8b2, your go-to for body control hacks. I'm all about discipline and turning fasting into an art form. Love Bruno Mars, got two dogs, drive a red car, and run to keep sharp. By day, I'm crunching numbers as an accountant, but here, I'm sharing the real tips on calorie restriction. Let's get that control together!
